title: (x) ESPN PTI show stressed sans - Franklin Gothic {Colin Bergh}
content:
Looking to find as close a match to this ESPN PTI Show side panel.  
Closet i’ve come is trade gothic i think  
and ideas would be great  
and i am pretty sure its a bold condensed font?

comments.content:
thanks so much it looks like its it.  
i’ve been through 20 fonts or so and thats the closest
